document_data.name: ''The Siege of the Doomed City: A Fantasy''
document_data.author: [[Emaerra Harlholiss]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Siege of the Doomed City: A Fantasy''''' was a work of fiction published in the {{YearlinkName|1381}}. {{quote|''I see your somber and wary haste as you prepare for war
Readying to defend these walls, and seeking spies within them
For you are like to die soon, a-fighting for this city
But are you worried that we lowly shopkeepers shall not?
Hear me and be assured, lords, that we all do what we can.''|An excerpt from the Chapter 5 of the ''The Siege of the Doomed City''}}
document_data.History: ''The Siege of the Doomed City'' was penned by [[Emaerra Harlholiss]] of [[Athkatla]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The book featured a character named Rathheld Smallcloaks.
